programme.title: Penny Bank
programme.desc: Middle aged Orhan is struggling with every aspect of his life: he has to take care of his comatose mother, he is in debt, he cannot fulfill his role as a father, and he has to juggle multiple jobs. Eventually, he has to make an impossible decision…

programme.title: Margherita Hack - The Lady Of The Stars
programme.desc: The intimate and emotional biography of Italian astrophysicist Margherita Hack, from an independent and curious child to the first female director of the Trieste Astronomical Observatory.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: When a U.S. Army deserter is granted asylum over claims of evidence of an alleged U.S. torture prison in the Czech Republic, Karla’s position as the new German ambassador in Prague is threatened. In order to find the truth, she is willing to risk it all.

programme.title: Aspromonte: Land Of The Forgotten
programme.desc: In 1959 in Africo, Aspromonte, a woman dies in childbirth because the lack of roads prevented the doctor from reaching in time. The tragedy unites the villagers and Giulia, a new teacher, to build a road. But Giulia must contend with local mafia Don Totó.

programme.title: On Our Watch
programme.desc: Arturo unsuspectingly introduces an algorithm that cost him his job, fiancée and his friends. In his loneliness, he grows attached to Stella, a hologram, who he might lose if he can’t renew his subscription. Will Arturo find love and freedom again?

programme.title: To My Beloved
programme.desc: Fernando is a good man who takes care of his only child, Daniel. Following the death of his wife Ana, every night Fernando recalls their love as he sorts out his beloved dead spouse’s belongings. One day he finds a VHS tape that will change everything.

programme.title: Sleepless Night

programme.desc: On Valentine's Day, Nishikata is sure Takagi-san will tease him. Meanwhile, various things happen within the school.

programme.title: Summer Rebels
programme.desc: Young Jonas wants to visit his cool grandpa in Slovakia for a summer of fun, but his mom has other plans. Undeterred, Jonas takes off on an adventure of his own in this luminous and light-hearted tale of rebellion, friendship, catastrophe and redemption.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: A Wicked Game
programme.desc: A violent assault on a German tourist pits Ambassador Karla Lorenz against friends and fellow diplomats as she tries to discover who is behind this and a string of other attacks on young women in the city.

programme.title: To My Beloved
programme.desc: Fernando is a good man who takes care of his only child, Daniel. Following the death of his wife Ana, every night Fernando recalls their love as he sorts out his beloved dead spouse’s belongings. One day he finds a VHS tape that will change everything.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Girl Gone Missing
programme.desc: Public Prosecutor Mehringer has been dealt a tough hand in his case against the Ukrainian arms trafficker Artem Lazarev: his most important witness is supposed to die. Investigator Sarah Kohr helps to stage the witness’ death, but all is not as they seem.

programme.title: Governance
programme.desc: Renzo, a brilliant and unscrupulous manager is forced to quit his position as general manager of an oil group after an investigation for corruption. Convinced that a young colleague betrayed him, he plots his revenge, but the situation gets out of hand.

programme.title: The Takeover
programme.desc: Cédric works in a company specialized in precision mechanics. Its management, run by an investment fund, is disastrous. As another fund is about to buy it again, Cédric decides to take the company over, giving it to the employees.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: Fatal Alibi
programme.desc: A young motorcyclist is killed in an accident. Daniel Stokr, an employee of the Czech Ministry of Economy, is accused of being involved. Though Karla takes on the case, she is able to give him an alibi, which sends her on an uncertain trail for the truth.

programme.title: Passenger 23
programme.desc: Martin, a police psychologist who lost his wife and his son during a vacation, receives a call that brings new clues about the disappearance of his family and returns to the same cruise ship to discover the truth.

programme.title: Latin For All
programme.desc: Delphine, a disillusioned Latin teacher, made a deal with her class of 5 lazy students: if they keep quiet, they’ll all receive A grades without having to learn anything. Unfortunately, this qualifies them for a Latin competition taking place in Naples.

programme.title: Mountain Woman
programme.desc: When famine overruns a small Japanese village, Rin must leave the village in order to protect her father accused of theft. Rin heads deep into Mt. Hayachin, and crosses the forbidden mountain god's shrine, where the goddess of thieves is said to dwell.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Silent Death
programme.desc: In a sealed factory with the highest security precautions, the destruction of deadly substances is underway. However, the lead chemist is kidnapped along with a canister of Sarin gas - an invisible and odourless poison that kills within minutes.

programme.title: Not My Type
programme.desc: A dashing philosopher is sent off to teach in a quiet northern town, where he soon falls for a bubbly and rather vulgar local hairdresser. But will the couple’s carnal affection manage to overcome their irreconcilable differences?

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not Hate
programme.desc: Simone is an established surgeon and son of a holocaust survivor. After refusing to save a victim of a traffic accident with a swastika tattoo, he must grapple with the guilt he feels from his decision.

programme.title: A Tale of Samurai Cooking - A True Love Story
programme.desc: Great cook Haru has married into the legendary “Kitchen Samurai” family. But her husband who is the successor of the Funaki family cannot cook at all. Haru makes a vow to make him a superb samurai chef and starts teaching her new husband how to cook.
